DOC.brief_title: Post-operative CT Follow After Nellix Endoprosthesis Implantation
DOC.detailed_description: Rationale : In patient abdominal aortic aneurysm Nellix Endoprosthesis aim reduce post-operative complication subsequent re-intervention rate . Using two stent cover two polymer fill endobags use seal exclude aneurysm sac . Preliminary result show promising result reduce complication . The new endoprosthesis different treatment also follow image . To date unknown stent , polymer fill endobags aneurysm appear CT image short long term follow . Objective : To assess describe normal compute tomography ( CT ) appearance 30 day 1 year implantation Nellix Endoprosthesis . Study population : Approximately total 100 patient underwent endovascular aneurysm repair use Nellix endoprosthesis three different hospital . The population comprise approximately fifty patient Rijnstate Ziekenhuis Arnhem twenty-five St. Antonius Nieuwegein St. Elisabeth Tilburg . Design method : The study design multicenter retrospective cohort . Using CT-scans regular follow date ( 30 day 1 year ) imaging retrospectively assess use medical imaging software . Main study endpoint define follow : 1 . Changes infrarenal neck morphology ( renal artery ) 2 . Changes thrombus aneurysm sac 3 . Changes aneurysm wall geometry 4 . Changes cobalt-chromium stent lumen 5 . Changes polymer-filled endobags Using anonymous patient data database create securely store . Patient consent study participation attain access patient file . Nature extent burden risk associate participation , benefit group relatedness : The study bring extra burden risk patient participate . Patients encourage participate improve insight patient disease might improve health care future group patient .
